docs.text: WSL - Windows Linux Subsystem Some tips etc on how to use Windows WSL Stop resolv.conf updating with local DNS If there is an issue connecting to some stuff defined in your WSL it is most likely DNS. To stop auto generation of resolv.conf you need to create a file /etc/wsl.conf and add the following, [network] generateResolvConf = false Then in a windows cmd line session, wsl --shutdown This shuts down wsl properly and saves any changes.
